segments.text: That overflowing sink is disgusting, water just pouring everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks filthy, spreading out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron might get soaked soon from all this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, filthy hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced on that stool, probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, eager for her dirty cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting water damage, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate so carefully, but ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel she's using might end up wet and useless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden seems clean and nice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen is turning into a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a sloppy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
